name: Controlled Burn
description:
A small prototype made for the 2020 GMTK Jam! Play as a fire and spread out of control using natural processes!

Create lightning strikes, cause localised heatwaves, and jump across gaps to burn the whole area.

The game is far from complete, and was originally planned to be a fight against the local fire department. I didn't have time to implement this, but the systems in place up to this point are pretty neat! Good to mess around with for a few minutes at any rate.

Thanks to Sam, @sammartin159 on twitter, for the original music! Wouldn't be a Team Dog? game without it.
